careers.text: Fractal Analytics is actively hiring for Software Engineer (Backend, Fullstack React), Data Engineer (Azure), GCP Engineer, Kafka Engineer, Automation Test Engineer, Gen AI Data Scientist. Hiring across Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Bengaluru, Gurgaon, and New York.
Fractal launched Gen AI Data Scientist Hiring Challenge 2025 for professionals with 2+ years experience — MCQ + ML question round, direct interviews for top performers.
Imagineer (Hiring Women in Tech) program targeting 2025 graduates. Compensation for B.Tech/MCA: INR 22 LPA over 3 years, starting at INR 6 LPA + INR 1 Lakh joining bonus.

news.text: Fractal Analytics raised $170 million in July 2025 through secondary share sale, valued at $2.44 billion. 22 investors participated, Apax Partners partially divested. Total funding: $855 million.
Fractal filed for IPO in August 2025 aiming to raise Rs 4,900 crore ($560M) at $3.5B+ valuation. IPO debuted Feb 2026 at $1.6B listing valuation.
Revenue grew 25.9% to Rs 2,765 crore in FY25. Net profit Rs 220 crore, turnaround from loss in previous year. EBITDAM targeting 20%+ from 13% in FY25.
Fractal invested $20M in Asper.ai (AI platform for consumer goods/manufacturing) in March 2025.

tech_stack.text: Fractal recognized as 'Leader' in Forrester Wave Customer Analytics Services Q2 2025. Partners with Microsoft (Azure OpenAI, Copilot, Cloud for Retail), OpenAI (Solutions Partner), NVIDIA, AWS (Premier Tier), and Databricks.
Won Retail & Consumer Goods 2025 Microsoft Partner of the Year Award. Heavy adoption of Azure OpenAI Service, Microsoft Copilot. Powers data-driven decisions for Fortune 500 companies.

blog.text: Fractal operates through two segments: Fractal.ai (AI services/products) and Fractal Alpha (independent AI ventures). Client base includes Microsoft, Apple, Nvidia, Alphabet, Amazon, Meta, Tesla.

decision_makers.name: Srikanth Velamakanni
decision_makers.raw_title: Group Chief Executive and Executive Vice-Chairman, co-founded Fractal in 2000. CEO from 2000-2019.

decision_makers.name: Pranay Agrawal
decision_makers.raw_title: Non-Executive Director and Chief Executive Officer for Fractal USA, appointed CEO in 2016.

decision_makers.name: Shashidhar Ramakrishnaiah
decision_makers.raw_title: Chief Technology Officer at Fractal Analytics.

decision_makers.name: Ajoy Singh
decision_makers.raw_title: Chief AI Officer at Fractal Analytics.

careers.text: Databricks workforce reached 9,000 employees in 2025. Actively hiring Software Engineer, Data Engineer, Platform Engineer, Solution Architect roles. Also hiring Software Engineer - New Grad 2025.
Tech stack: Python, SQL, Scala, Java, C++, R, JavaScript, TypeScript. Requires Apache Spark, Delta Lake, Unity Catalog, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Jenkins, MLflow.
Solution Architect roles specialize in data engineering, data science, cloud platforms, and security. Interview process includes technical coding, architectural, and executive interviews.

news.text: Databricks closed $1 billion Series K (Sep 2025) at $100B+ valuation, led by Andreessen Horowitz, Insight Partners, MGX, Thrive Capital. For AI strategy, Agent Bricks, Lakebase, AI acquisitions.
Databricks raising Series L of $4 billion+ (Dec 2025) at $134 billion valuation. Revenue run-rate exceeding $4.8B in Q3 2025, 55%+ YoY growth. Positive free cash flow.

Strategic partnerships in 2025: Anthropic ($100M 5-year deal, March), Google Cloud/Gemini (4-year deal, June), NTT DATA ($200M target), Kyndryl global alliance (June). Accenture/Avanade 7th consecutive Global Partner of the Year.
Launched Agent Bricks (AI agent development platform), Lakebase (transactional database), and Databricks One (no-code AI BI platform) at 2025 Data + AI Summit.

tech_stack.text: Core: Lakehouse architecture unifying data lakes + warehouses. Built on Apache Spark. Delta Lake for ACID transactions. Unity Catalog as data governance 'operating system'. MLflow for ML lifecycle.
2025 stack: Python, SQL, PySpark essential. ETL: Medallion Architecture, Apache Airflow, Fivetran, dbt. Cloud: AWS, Azure, GCP. New: Agent Bricks, Lakebase, Databricks Apps, embedded GenAI.

blog.text: 2025 vision: 'Data Intelligence Platform' — embedding Generative AI into workflows, Unity Catalog central governance. Data Warehousing and AI products each exceed $1B revenue run-rate.

decision_makers.name: Ali Ghodsi
decision_makers.raw_title: CEO and co-founder of Databricks. Previously VP of Engineering and Product Management. Became CEO in 2016.

decision_makers.name: Matei Zaharia
decision_makers.raw_title: CTO and co-founder. Founded Apache Spark in 2009 at UC Berkeley PhD. Leads tech/research roadmap, core platform: Spark, Delta Lake, MLflow.

decision_makers.name: Ion Stoica
decision_makers.raw_title: Executive Chairman, co-founder. Strategic oversight on M&A and R&D priorities.

decision_makers.name: Patrick Wendell
decision_makers.raw_title: Co-founder and SVP Engineering at Databricks.

careers.text: MindsDB actively hiring — seeking passionate ML engineers. Benefits: unlimited PTO, remote work setup budget, company offsites, personal development budget. Expanding team with Series C funding.
Key roles include ML Engineer, Data Engineer, Backend Engineer, DevOps. Focus on building AI-in-database technology. Team is fully remote.

news.text: MindsDB closed $47M Series C (Oct 2025) at $150M valuation, led by Benchmark and Mayfield. Funds for scaling ops, expanding team, enhancing products, new features, market presence.

MindsDB declared full support for Model Context Protocol (MCP) across open-source and enterprise platforms (April 2025) — becoming a unified AI data hub standardizing AI model access to enterprise data.
Strategic partnerships: aiComply + NavigateCyber for Federal ATO (Nov 2025), Google collaboration for MCP Toolbox (Nov 2025), Oracle + Salesforce integrations (Oct 2025).
Intelligent Protection Management Corp signed AI Reseller Agreement with MindsDB (Sep 2025). Y Combinator backed. Open-source AI-in-database platform.

tech_stack.text: Core tech: AI-in-database platform — brings ML directly into databases. Supports MCP protocol for standardized AI model access. Open-source with enterprise tier. Integrations with Oracle, Salesforce, Google.
Founded 2017, Y Combinator backed. Platform enables real-time predictions from existing databases without external ML pipelines. Python + SQL interface for ML.

blog.text: MindsDB vision: democratize ML by making it accessible through SQL. No need for separate ML infrastructure — predictions happen inside your existing database.

decision_makers.name: Jorge Torres
decision_makers.raw_title: Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer at MindsDB. Founded 2017.

decision_makers.name: Adam Carrigan
decision_makers.raw_title: Co-Founder and Chief Operating Officer at MindsDB.

decision_makers.name: Brad Gyger
decision_makers.raw_title: Chief Revenue Officer at MindsDB.

decision_makers.name: Sidney Rabsatt
decision_makers.raw_title: Chief Product Officer at MindsDB.

funding.text: Cropin raised $30M Series B in 2021 led by Asia Impact (formerly BlueOrchard), with participation from Google and Cargill. Funds allocated to expanding AI platform SmartFarm and entering new geographies.
Cropin previously raised $8M Series A in 2019 from Chiratae Ventures, Beenext, and Qualcomm Ventures. Total funding approximately $38M.

careers.text: Cropin actively hiring for Data Engineer, AI/ML Platform Engineer, and IoT Systems Architect roles on LinkedIn (Q1 2026). Open positions in Bengaluru for building scalable agri-data pipelines.
careers.verification_source: LinkedIn Jobs search: site:linkedin.com/jobs Cropin Technology

careers.text: Cropin hiring Head of Data Science to lead precision farming analytics and predictive crop yield modeling. Bachelor's or Master's in CS/Statistics required, 10+ years experience.

product.text: Cropin's SmartFarm platform manages 17 million acres of farmland globally. SmartRisk module uses satellite imagery + ML to predict crop stress, disease, and yield deviation.
Cropin launched Knowledge Graph in 2024 — world's first agriculture-specific AI knowledge graph covering 500+ crops, 10,000+ crop varieties, trained on 7 years of on-field data.

infra.text: Cropin's IoT sensor network generates 40+ data streams per farm plot (soil moisture, temperature, humidity, NDVI via satellite). Data pipeline processes terabytes monthly — strain on ingestion and processing infra.
infra.source: Cropin technical whitepaper (2023, available on website)

infra.text: Cropin migrating workloads from AWS batch to streaming (Kafka-based) to handle real-time crop advisory at scale. Engineering blog mentions latency challenges in edge-to-cloud pipeline.
infra.verification_source: UNVERIFIED — mentioned in LinkedIn posts by Cropin engineers but blog post not publicly confirmed

gtm.text: Cropin partnered with State Bank of India (SBI) to deploy credit-scoring model for 500,000+ smallholder farmers using crop yield prediction data.
Cropin signed enterprise contract with Olam International (Singapore agri-commodities, $35B revenue) to deploy SmartFarm across 400,000 acres of cocoa and coffee plantations in West Africa.

decision_makers.name: Krishna Kumar
decision_makers.raw_title: Co-founder and CEO of Cropin Technology. Former Wipro. IIM Bangalore alumnus.

decision_makers.name: Kunal Prasad
decision_makers.raw_title: Co-founder and COO. Handles go-to-market and enterprise partnerships.

funding.text: Bentley Systems (NASDAQ: BSY) went public via IPO in September 2020 at $17/share, raising $224M. Market cap currently ~$16B. Revenue for FY2024 was approximately $1.3B, up 10% YoY.
funding.source: Bentley Systems Investor Relations / SEC filings (2024 Annual Report)

funding.text: Bentley acquired Cesium (3D geospatial platform) in 2025 to strengthen its digital twin infrastructure layer for civil engineering simulations.
funding.verification_source: UNVERIFIED — reported by multiple engineering trade publications but acquisition details unconfirmed as of filing date

careers.text: Bentley hiring AI/ML Research Engineers and Data Platform Engineers (50+ active LinkedIn roles, Q1 2026). Roles focus on AI for structural analysis, predictive maintenance, and civil simulation.
Bentley posted 12 Data Engineer and Analytics Engineer roles in Q4 2025, requiring experience with Azure Data Factory, Apache Spark, and Databricks for engineering data lakehouse.

product.text: Bentley launched iTwin platform for infrastructure digital twins — engineers can model entire city infrastructure (bridges, roads, utilities) in 4D simulations. 2024 version includes AI anomaly detection for structural health monitoring.
product.source: Bentley Year in Infrastructure 2024 (annual conference keynote)

infra.text: Bentley's engineering simulation workloads require HPC-grade compute for finite element analysis (FEA). Data volumes from global infrastructure projects exceed 200TB per quarter — strain on data pipeline and model serving infra.
infra.source: Bentley technical whitepaper — Infrastructure Data Management (2024)

infra.text: Bentley's data engineering team posted internal job description mentioning 'scaling from batch to streaming for real-time infrastructure monitoring feeds' — clear infra expansion signal.
infra.verification_source: LinkedIn job post by Bentley Systems

gtm.text: Bentley signed multi-year enterprise agreement with UK National Highways to digitize 14,000+ km of road network using iTwin and AI-based asset management.

decision_makers.name: Greg Bentley
decision_makers.raw_title: CEO of Bentley Systems, co-founder. Harvard MBA. Public company CEO since 1991.

decision_makers.name: David Sharpless
decision_makers.raw_title: CTO responsible for AI platform, iTwin, and engineering data infrastructure.

funding.text: Dr. Reddy's reported FY2025 consolidated revenue of Rs 32,647 crore (~$3.9B), growth of 16% YoY. Net profit Rs 5,601 crore. Company investing heavily in digital transformation and AI drug discovery.
funding.source: Dr. Reddy's Laboratories FY2025 Annual Report / BSE filing

careers.text: Dr. Reddy's posted 40+ Data Science and AI/ML roles in Q4 2025–Q1 2026 on LinkedIn. Roles include: Director of AI/ML Platform, Senior NLP Engineer (regulatory document parsing), Data Engineer (manufacturing analytics).
Dr. Reddy's Digital Analytics team (Hyderabad CoE) actively hiring for Azure ML, Databricks, and Python-based data platform roles. Team scaled from 20 to 80 engineers in 18 months.
careers.verification_source: economictimes.indiatimes.com — Dr. Reddy's digital analytics COE

product.text: Dr. Reddy's launched 'Sparsh' AI assistant for medical representatives — uses NLP and CRM data to personalize physician outreach recommendations. Deployed to 5,000+ sales reps across India.
Dr. Reddy's partnered with Bayer to co-develop AI models for crop science and agriculture pharma crossover — supply chain and drug analytics pipeline.
product.verification_source: UNVERIFIED — mentioned in investor call transcript summary, exact details not publicly confirmed

infra.text: Dr. Reddy's IT restructuring in 2024–2025 migrated core ERP from SAP on-premise to Azure cloud. Data lakes being built for clinical trial data, pharmacovigilance, and manufacturing quality control.
infra.source: Economic Times / Dr. Reddy's IT leadership LinkedIn posts (2024)

infra.text: CTO of Dr. Reddy's mentioned in a YourStory interview (2025) that their data engineering team is 'scaling ML infra to handle real-time manufacturing quality signals and batch genomics pipelines simultaneously.'
infra.source: YourStory interview with Dr. Reddy's CTO (2025)
infra.verification_source: UNVERIFIED — interview summary available on YourStory paywalled; quote paraphrased from LinkedIn summary post

gtm.text: Dr. Reddy's expanded US generics market share in 2024: filed 82 ANDAs (abbreviated new drug applications), received 55 approvals. US business now 43% of total revenue.
gtm.source: Dr. Reddy's Q3 FY2025 Investor Call transcript (BSE filing)
gtm.verification_source: bseindia.com — Dr. Reddys Q3FY25 results investor presentation

decision_makers.name: Erez Israeli
decision_makers.raw_title: CEO of Dr. Reddy's Laboratories since 2019. Leads global business strategy and digital transformation.

decision_makers.name: Kartik Mehta
decision_makers.raw_title: Chief Digital Officer overseeing AI/ML platform, data engineering, and digital health initiatives.
decision_makers.verification_source: UNVERIFIED — role title unconfirmed on public profiles; based on LinkedIn search

meta.competitor_note: ⚠️ Potential Competitor — Not a Target Client. Clari builds AI-powered revenue operations and sales signal intelligence — directly overlapping with Datavex's core offering.

funding.text: Clari raised $225M Series F in January 2022 at a $1.6B valuation (unicorn), led by Silver Lake. Total funding: $495M. Funds for product expansion, enterprise sales hiring, and international go-to-market.
Clari acquired Groove (B2B sales engagement platform) in 2023 to expand from forecasting into full-funnel revenue execution. Deal size undisclosed but estimated $500M+ by industry analysts.

careers.text: Clari hiring for AI Research Engineer, Revenue Intelligence Product Manager, and Enterprise Sales Engineer roles on LinkedIn (Q1 2026). Strong focus on large language model integration into deal scoring.

product.text: Clari's Revenue Platform uses AI to analyze sales signals (emails, calls, CRM data, deal velocity) to forecast revenue and surface at-risk accounts. G2 Leader in Revenue Intelligence and Sales Analytics 2025.
product.source: G2 Category Leader Report — Revenue Intelligence (2025)

product.text: Clari launched 'Copilot for Revenue' in 2024 — AI-powered assistant that uses GPT-4-class LLMs to auto-update CRM, draft follow-up emails, and generate deal health summaries. Competes directly with seller-side AI tools.

gtm.text: Clari customers include Okta, Zoom, Adobe, and Workday. Reports 95%+ gross revenue retention. Enterprise ACV (annual contract value) averages $100K+.
gtm.source: Clari website / G2 reviews / SEC filing references

decision_makers.name: Andy Byrne
decision_makers.raw_title: Co-founder and CEO of Clari. Former VP at VMware. Stanford-educated.

decision_makers.name: Venkat Rangan
decision_makers.raw_title: Co-founder and CTO. PhD from Georgia Tech. Leads AI/ML platform and product engineering.
